oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lowell Blanchard's Radio Album
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: WNOX
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pamphlet from WNOX with pictures of stars from the shows, the station downtown, Old Market Hall, jokes, riddles, skits, song lyrics.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Radio stations; Radio broadcasting; Joking; Portraits; Photographs; Promotional materials;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
